citation.title: Cloning of human p55 gamma, a regulatory subunit of phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase, by a yeast two-hybrid library screen with the insulin-like growth factor-I receptor.

citation.name: Nat. Genet.
citation.title: Complete sequencing and characterization of 21,243 full-length human cDNAs.

citation.name: Nature
citation.title: The DNA sequence and biological annotation of human chromosome 1.

citation.name: Biochem. Biophys. Res. Commun.
citation.title: Interaction of Axl receptor tyrosine kinase with C1-TEN, a novel C1 domain-containing protein with homology to tensin.

comment.text: Binds to activated (phosphorylated) protein-tyrosine kinases through its SH2 domain and regulates their kinase activity. During insulin stimulation, it also binds to IRS-1.
Heterodimer of a regulatory subunit PIK3R3 and a p110 catalytic subunit (PIK3CA, PIK3CB or PIK3CD). Interacts with AXL.
Highest levels in brain and testis. Lower levels in adipose tissue, kidney, heart, lung and skeletal muscle.
Belongs to the PI3K p85 subunit family.

property.value: Synthesis of PIPs at the plasma membrane
Constitutive Signaling by Aberrant PI3K in Cancer
PI5P, PP2A and IER3 Regulate PI3K/AKT Signaling
Expressed in nasal cavity epithelium and 226 other tissues
P:cell migration involved in sprouting angiogenesis
